function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"The use of xr technology and virtual environments could lead to decreased physical activity and an associated increase in sedentary behavior, leading to health issues.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased adoption of xr technology may lead to cybersecurity risks and potential exposure to virtual threats, impacting data privacy and security.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through increased physical interactions in urban areas and cities due to the use of xr technology.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared holographic displays","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of infection due to crowded spaces around holographic displays","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of virus transmission through shared touch surfaces on holographic display interfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of high fidelity mobile holographic capability may lead to increased physical interaction and close proximity among individuals, potentially facilitating the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased physical interaction in urban spaces and events.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate technological infrastructure for 6g and smart cities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation of new types of devices leading to obsolescence of existing ones","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving supportive infrastructures for 6g technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cost implications and extensive upgrades for existing networks","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift towards less face-to-face human interactions due to the outbreak of covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid shift to digital technology in architecture education","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Globalization of design studios and classes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slowdown in technology advancements due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged existence of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Second/third wave of the pandemic in cities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical reference to the spanish flu pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limitation of infrastructural capacity for 6g wireless technology due to different antenna and transceiver designs","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Compatibility issues with 6g devices and sensors","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ethical and moral issues related to 6g technology","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mobile apps for tracking covid-19 infected persons","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on video conferencing technologies for communications","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drones and robots for delivering medical supplies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased data sharing due to technological frameworks like 6g","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in data generation from various technologies like ai, crowd computing, ar, and 5g","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in 5g deployment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks associated with 6g wireless technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial limitations in technological infrastructure development for 6g implementation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges related to legal concerns and ethics","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bias in favoring large ict corporations in the implementation of smart city products","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Local smes in the ict sector are overlooked for opportunities in data collection, storage, and computation, which are mostly handled by large corporations in smart cities.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital non-taxation regimes in different countries benefit large corporations, depriving local smes in the ict sector of fair competition and market access.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Post-covid-19 stimulus packages and strategies favor the embrace of new digital technologies, potentially creating a competitive advantage for larger politico-financed competitors over local smes in the ict sector.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cessation of the world trade organisation wto moratorium on custom duties for electronic transmissions","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing rate of transactions coupling data and financial","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development and application of 6g technology without considering health implications","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of sustainability in the design and manufacturing of iot devices","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overwhelmed healthcare facilities due to the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global economic impact and recession due to the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in urban environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of recognition and consideration of pandemics in urban planning and architectural professional institutions.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mosquito-infested swamplands in post-wwi and spanish flu eras","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disease-infested environments in risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases such as zika, h1n1, and covid-19 leading to social and political tensions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to provide compensation to affected businesses during health crises","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of planning and
